security: Revealing the proposed station (Mexico City) and position (Operations Officer) could compromise ongoing or future operations in that region.
summary: This is a personnel action request to transfer Joseph S. Cocolo to Mexico City as an Operations Officer. The request details his current position, proposed role, estimated departure date, and number of dependents.
summary_one_paragraph: A request dated December 20, 1967, seeks to transfer Joseph S. Cocolo, currently an Operations Officer, to Mexico City as an Operations Officer (GS-13), effective approximately January 27, 1968. The document, signed by John F. Conroy, indicates Cocolo will be in the Headquarters area around January 23, 1968, as a lateral transfer with one dependent accompanying him. Security approval has been granted as of December 27, 1967.
title: Request for PCS Overseas Evaluation for Joseph S. Cocolo
